statements: SELECT * FROM security_breach_attempts;
SELECT username, attempted_action FROM security_breach_attempts;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM security_breach_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_breach_attempts WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attempts FROM security_breach_attempts WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM security_breach_attempts WHERE username = 'admin' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, username, timestamp FROM security_breach_attempts WHERE attempted_action LIKE '%login%' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT DISTINCT username, COUNT(*) AS total_attempts FROM security_breach_attempts GROUP BY username ORDER BY total_attempts DESC
SELECT attempted_action, COUNT(*) AS total_attempts FROM security_breach_attempts GROUP BY attempted_action HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_attempts DESC
SELECT username, COUNT(*) AS total_attempts FROM security_breach_attempts WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31' GROUP BY username ORDER BY total_attempts DESC
SELECT * FROM security_logs;
SELECT id, event_type FROM security_logs WHERE event_timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM notification_settings WHERE enabled = true;
SELECT admin_email FROM notification_settings WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, details FROM security_logs ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_logs WHERE event_type = 'Login' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM security_logs WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC
SELECT COUNT(id) AS num_events, event_type FROM security_logs GROUP BY event_type HAVING num_events > 5
SELECT id, event_type, details FROM security_logs WHERE details LIKE '%error%' AND event_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT id, admin_email, enabled FROM notification_settings WHERE enabled = true
SELECT * FROM security_logs;
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM security_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM breach_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action_type FROM breach_attempts WHERE action_type LIKE '%login%';
SELECT notification_message, timestamp FROM admin_notifications WHERE admin_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_logs;
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM security_logs WHERE log_id > 5 ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attempts FROM breach_attempts WHERE action_type = 'LOGIN';
SELECT notification_message, timestamp FROM admin_notifications WHERE admin_id = 10 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attempts FROM breach_attempts GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM security_logs ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_time FROM security_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT admin_name, admin_email FROM administrators;
SELECT notification_time, message FROM notifications WHERE admin_id = 456 ORDER BY notification_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM breach_attempts WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT * FROM security_logs ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) FROM security_logs GROUP BY event_type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT admin_name, admin_email FROM administrators WHERE admin_id = 1;
SELECT notification_time, message FROM notifications WHERE notification_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY notification_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, ip_address, COUNT(*) FROM breach_attempts GROUP BY user_id, ip_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM security_logs;
SELECT id, event_type, event_details FROM security_logs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM breach_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, trigger_name FROM triggers WHERE id < 5;
SELECT username, role FROM admin_users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM security_logs WHERE event_type = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, user_id FROM breach_attempts WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.10' AND message LIKE '%Unauthorized%';
SELECT trigger_name, description FROM triggers WHERE trigger_action = 'email' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM alert_notifications WHERE alert_type = 'security' AND is_read = FALSE OR notification_time < NOW();
SELECT username, email, role FROM admin_users WHERE role = 'administrator' ORDER BY username ASC;
